qas.question: Chocolate melts in the heat. Snowman melts in the heat. What does ice do in the heat?
Butter melts in heat. Wax melts in heat. What does ice do in heat?
Rain makes the ground wet. A hose makes the ground wet. What does a spilled cup make the floor?
A push makes a swing move. A pull makes a swing move. What does a shove do to the swing?
A key opens a lock. A code opens a lock. What does the right key do?
Warm hands melt snow. Warm sun melts snow. What does warm water do to snow?
A fan makes the air move. A breeze makes the air move. What does a blower do to the air?
A bell rings when you hit it. A drum sounds when you hit it. What happens to a cymbal when you hit it?
Cold makes water freeze. A freezer makes water freeze. What does ice make water do?
Soap makes hands clean. Water makes hands clean. What does soap and water do to hands?
A magnet pulls paper clips. A magnet pulls nails. What does a magnet do to a key?
